actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to take an enumeration of horses in 1978 and every 5 years thereafter.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, through the Statistical Reporting Service, to take an enumeration of horses in the United States, by the "sampling" method if preferred, in 1978 and in every fifth year beginning after 1978. Authorizes the appropriation of $3,000,000 for fiscal year 1978 and $600,000 for each following fiscal year.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to take an enumeration of horses in 1978 and every 5 years thereafter.
